trans-unit.source: Specifies a description for a property or event.
A visual designer can display the specified description when referencing the component member, such as in a Properties window.
Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> to access the value of this attribute.
For more information, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref> class with no parameters.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref> class with a description.
The description text.
Specifies the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref>, which is an empty string ("").
This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
To be added.
Gets the description stored in this attribute.
The description stored in this attribute.
Gets or sets the string stored as the description.
The default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> property simply returns this value.
This extra property exists so that you can derive from <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute> and provide a localized version.
The derived localizable <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute> will maintain a private Boolean field to indicate if it has been localized.
On the first access to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> property, it will look up the localized string and store it back in the DescriptionValue property.
The string stored as the description.
The default value is an empty string ("").
Returns whether the value of the given object is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref>.
The object to test the value equality of.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Returns a value indicating whether this is the default <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref> instance.
The default value is an empty string ("").

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if this is the default <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
